title: How do I exit safe mode?
answer:
To exit safe mode, restart your phone.

Your phone enters safe mode if you press and hold the volume down key until the phone powers on during its startup.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204202418793001.jpg)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204202418782002.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
